nodes.text: Tilnes Falling is an article written by Morrie Mullins as a tie in to the Living Force adventure Caaried Away. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on March 6 2003 and took the form of an internal memo sent by the Verga Mer Mining Company to all its Area Managers. It referred to the events that took place in Tilnes Rising, an earlier adventure in the Broken Orbits trilogy.
